.. _uxd_parser:

**********************************************
UXD Parser (:mod:`~labreportpy.io.uxd_parser`)
**********************************************

.. currentmodule:: labreportpy.io.uxd_parser

This submodule provides a class to handle (i.e. read, write, and parse)
``.UXD`` files from different scans written by a Bruker D8 XRD system.



Reference/API
=============

.. automodapi:: labreportpy.io.uxd_parser
    :inherited-members: Module
